name: Lunatone
author: Hisao Nakamura
flavor_text: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.

abilities.name: Sol Shade
abilities.effect: If you have Solrock in play, {R} Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent’s) have no Abilities, except Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
